page.title: 01Intro.to Earlston District.
page.content: Our block is mainly an agricultural area with mixed farming.The area is dominated by the{Black Hill}which rises to 1031feet.From the top a vast area can be viewed.The community consists of the large village of {Earlston}and nine farms.The area has a variety of wild life,flowers and trees.The village has a primary and secondary school,one large church,a limited selection of shops and several small industrial units.The{River {Leader}flows through the area.There is a bus service but most families have their own car.A variety of sports are played in the adequate facilities.
